extension.summary: Listen to custom radio streams with station fanart and on-screen track information
extension.news:
v1.5.3 (2017-08-22) - Update tunein.com track info scraper to work with new site layout - Update Buddha Radio source with new branding
v1.5.2 (2017-08-19) - Set embedded addon repository to communicate using HTTPS
v1.5.1 (2017-03-26) - Bugfix: Prevent skin patch lockout when addon and skin have both been updated
v1.5.0 (2017-03-26) - Bugfix: Prevented skins ending up in a partially patched state. Broken skins should be fixed by reinstalling - Improveed skin patching so that line numbers don't need to match - Redesigned addon icon for cleaner (less confusing) look
v1.4.2 (2017-01-09) - Bugfix: Removed conflict which prevented live TV show title from being displayed in Xperience1080 OSD
v1.4.1 (2017-01-26) - Fixed compatibility with Python 2.6 for Android devices
v1.4.0 (2016-12-29) - Changed skin patching so that modifications aren't removed after playback stops - Enabled auto-updating using embedded repository extension point - Bug fixes and tidy-up
v1.3.0 (2016-11-19) - Added sorting methods and improved default sorting - Removed unintentional maximum bitrate restriction
v1.2.2 (2016-11-07) - Added support for Kodi 17 - Bug fixes
v1.2.1 (2016-10-29) - Added licence
v1.2.0 (2016-10-29) - Split radio sources into separate XML files - Added module for patching skins, to enable the display of track information - Added display of now playing track information from Tunein.com and last.fm
v1.1.1 (2016-09-18) - Bugfix: Added default value for maximum bitrate setting to prevent error if not set
v1.1.0 (2016.09.17) - Prevented users' customisations in sources.xml from being overwritten by updates
v1.0.0 (2016-09-17) - Initial release
